description: Synthetic data template for personal health insurance policies in Canada, including details about health coverage, plan types (Basic, Standard, Enhanced), covered expenses, and eligibility.

PolicyID.description: Unique identifier for the personal health insurance policy (e.g., PHI-123456).

PolicyHolderDOB.description: Date of birth of the policyholder.

PolicyStartDate.description: Start date of the personal health insurance policy.

PolicyEndDate.description: End date of the personal health insurance policy (if applicable).

PolicyType.description: The type of personal health insurance policy chosen by the policyholder.

CoverageLimit.description: The maximum amount covered per year for the policyholder’s health expenses.

DeductibleAmount.description: The deductible amount that the policyholder must pay before the insurance coverage begins.

CoinsurancePercentage.description: The percentage of the medical expenses the policyholder must pay after the deductible is met.

PrescriptionDrugCoverage.description: Indicates whether prescription drug coverage is included in the plan.

DentalCareCoverage.description: Indicates whether dental care coverage (e.g., teeth cleanings, braces, crowns) is included in the plan.

VisionCareCoverage.description: Indicates whether vision care coverage (e.g., eye exams, glasses) is included in the plan.

EmergencyTravelCoverage.description: Indicates whether emergency travel medical services coverage is included (for out-of-country medical expenses).

PhysiotherapyCoverage.description: Indicates whether physiotherapy coverage for injury recovery is included in the plan.

MedicalEquipmentCoverage.description: Indicates whether medical equipment (e.g., mobility aids) coverage is included in the plan.

PolicyHolderEmploymentStatus.description: Employment status of the policyholder, which may affect their eligibility or need for personal health insurance.

EmployerCoverageTopUp.description: Indicates whether the policyholder is using this personal health insurance to top up their employer’s workplace plan.

PolicyHolderRetirementStatus.description: Indicates whether the policyholder is retired or nearing retirement.

items.description: List of exclusions that are not covered under the policy.

Exclusions.description: Exclusions under the personal health insurance policy (e.g., cosmetic procedures, pre-existing conditions).

HealthServicesIncluded.description: List of health services that are covered under the personal health insurance policy.

FamilyCoverageOption.description: Indicates whether the policyholder has opted for family coverage under the policy.

items.description: Names of family members covered under the policy, if applicable.

FamilyMembersCovered.description: List of family members covered under the personal health insurance policy.

PolicyStatus.description: Current status of the personal health insurance policy.

PolicyHolderOccupation.description: Occupation of the policyholder, which may impact the insurance premium or coverage options.

PreExistingConditionsCovered.description: Indicates whether pre-existing medical conditions are covered under the policy.

AdditionalRiders.description: Optional riders added to the policy to provide additional coverage.

PolicyPremiumAmount.description: The monthly or annual premium amount the policyholder pays for the health insurance.

PolicyPremiumFrequency.description: The frequency at which premiums are paid for the personal health insurance.
